16namespace v8 {
17namespace internal {
18
19// These definitions are here in order to please the linker, which in debug mode
20// sometimes requires static constants to be defined in .cc files.
21const size_t ZoneCompression::kReservationSize;
22const size_t ZoneCompression::kReservationAlignment;
23
24namespace {
25
26static constexpr size_t kZonePageSize = 256 * KB;
27
28VirtualMemory ReserveAddressSpace(v8::PageAllocator* platform_allocator) {
29 DCHECK(IsAligned(ZoneCompression::kReservationSize,
30 platform_allocator->AllocatePageSize()));
31
32 void* hint = reinterpret_cast<void*>(RoundDown(
33 reinterpret_cast<uintptr_t>(platform_allocator->GetRandomMmapAddr()),
34 ZoneCompression::kReservationAlignment));
35
36 VirtualMemory memory(platform_allocator, ZoneCompression::kReservationSize,
37 hint, ZoneCompression::kReservationAlignment);
38 if (memory.IsReserved()) {
39 CHECK(IsAligned(memory.address(), ZoneCompression::kReservationAlignment));
40 return memory;
41 }
42
43 base::FatalOOM(base::OOMType::kProcess,
44 "Failed to reserve memory for compressed zones");
45 UNREACHABLE();
46}
47
48std::unique_ptr<v8::base::BoundedPageAllocator> CreateBoundedAllocator(
49 v8::PageAllocator* platform_allocator, Address reservation_start) {
50 CHECK(reservation_start);
51 CHECK(IsAligned(reservation_start, ZoneCompression::kReservationAlignment));
52
53 auto allocator = std::make_unique<v8::base::BoundedPageAllocator>(
54 platform_allocator, reservation_start, ZoneCompression::kReservationSize,
55 kZonePageSize,
56 base::PageInitializationMode::kAllocatedPagesCanBeUninitialized,
57 base::PageFreeingMode::kMakeInaccessible);
58
59 // Exclude first page from allocation to ensure that accesses through
60 // decompressed null pointer will seg-fault.
61 allocator->AllocatePagesAt(reservation_start, kZonePageSize,
62 v8::PageAllocator::kNoAccess);
63 return allocator;
64}
65
66} // namespace
67
68AccountingAllocator::AccountingAllocator()
69 : zone_backing_malloc_(
70 V8::GetCurrentPlatform()->GetZoneBackingAllocator()->GetMallocFn()),
71 zone_backing_free_(
72 V8::GetCurrentPlatform()->GetZoneBackingAllocator()->GetFreeFn()) {
73 if (COMPRESS_ZONES_BOOL) {
74 v8::PageAllocator* platform_page_allocator = GetPlatformPageAllocator();
75 VirtualMemory memory = ReserveAddressSpace(platform_page_allocator);
76 reserved_area_ = std::make_unique<VirtualMemory>(std::move(memory));
77 bounded_page_allocator_ = CreateBoundedAllocator(platform_page_allocator,
78 reserved_area_->address());
79 }
80}
81
82AccountingAllocator::~AccountingAllocator() = default;
83
84Segment* AccountingAllocator::AllocateSegment(size_t bytes,
85 bool supports_compression) {
86 void* memory;
87 if (COMPRESS_ZONES_BOOL && supports_compression) {
88 bytes = RoundUp(bytes, kZonePageSize);
89 memory = AllocatePages(bounded_page_allocator_.get(), nullptr, bytes,
90 kZonePageSize, PageAllocator::kReadWrite);
91
92 } else {
93 auto result = AllocAtLeastWithRetry(bytes);
94 memory = result.ptr;
95 bytes = result.count;
96 }
97 if (memory == nullptr) return nullptr;
98
99 size_t current =
100 current_memory_usage_.fetch_add(bytes, std::memory_order_relaxed) + bytes;
101 size_t max = max_memory_usage_.load(std::memory_order_relaxed);
102 while (current > max && !max_memory_usage_.compare_exchange_weak(
103 max, current, std::memory_order_relaxed)) {
104 // {max} was updated by {compare_exchange_weak}; retry.
105 }
106 DCHECK_LE(sizeof(Segment), bytes);
107 return new (memory) Segment(bytes);
108}
109
110void AccountingAllocator::ReturnSegment(Segment* segment,
111 bool supports_compression) {
112 segment->ZapContents();
113 size_t segment_size = segment->total_size();
114 current_memory_usage_.fetch_sub(segment_size, std::memory_order_relaxed);
115 segment->ZapHeader();
116 if (COMPRESS_ZONES_BOOL && supports_compression) {
117 FreePages(bounded_page_allocator_.get(), segment, segment_size);
118 } else {
119 free(segment);
120 }
121}
122
123} // namespace internal
124} // namespace v8
